arcana.message.scribbling_tool_no_map: You need more paper to take notes
gui.widget.1: Ages ago the best arcane alchemist roamed the land, he left clues of his inventions in different places, but fearing for the worst he locked them behind with magic, now you, descendant of the first alchemist need to search for the power your ancestor left, try searching for a village that alchemist left one of his prototypes in there
message.arcana: You found a old note in the floor, use it and press %1$s to see the information on it
tooltip.arcana.shift_to_view: Press shift to view item structure
